deploy(address,bytes32).details: It is recommended to not have more than 200 signers as opcode repricing could make transactions impossible to execute as all the signers must be passed for each transaction.

params._mainModule: Address of the main module to be used by the wallet
params._salt: Salt used to generate the wallet, which is the imageHash of the wallet's configuration.
